Min and max values of an integer

21 Feb 2018

\begin{align} \label{1} min = -1 * 2^{n - 1} \end{align}

The equation \ref{1} illustrates the minimum value of an -bit integer.

\begin{align} \label{2} max = 2^{n - 1} - 1 \end{align}

The equation \ref{2} illustrates the maximum value of an -bit integer.

\begin{align} \label{3} min = 0 \end{align}

The equation \ref{3} illustrates the minimum value of an non-negative -bit integer.

\begin{align} \label{4} max = 2^n - 1 \end{align}

The equation \ref{4} illustrates the maximum value of an non-negative -bit integer.
